name: Power Serve 3D Tennis
overview: Grab a racket and experience virtual tennis how it was meant to be played. Boasting the most advanced 3D Game design ever seen on a sports title, Power Serve 3D Tennis utilizes the full potential of the PlayStation console's powerful new generation technology - to deliver a benchmark event in interactive sporting. Large, life-like players put you right on the court. Smooth, full-motion character movement allows you free 360 mobility. A.I. motivated competitors keep you at the top of your game. So real, you can't play it sitting down.
